name: moomoo-milk
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 100 HP.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A nutritious milk
that restores HP
by 100 points.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A nutritious milk
that restores HP
by 100 points.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
Highly nutritious milk.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 100 points.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
Milk with a very high nutrition content.
It restores the HP of one Pokémon by
100 points.

100 points.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A bottle of highly nutritious milk.
When consumed, it restores
100 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A bottle of highly nutritious milk. When consumed,
it restores up to 100 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
A bottle of highly nutritious milk. When consumed,

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
A bottle of highly nutritious milk. It can be used to
restore 100 HP to a single Pokémon.
